alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Trego (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued April 20 at 8:46PM CDT until April 21 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...Fire Risk Diminishing This Evening... ...Red Flag Warning Will Expire at 9 PM Thursday... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 030 AND 031... ...RED FLAG WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 9 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 030 AND 031... * AFFECTED AREA...In Kansas, Fire Weather Zone 030 Trego and Fire Weather Zone 031 Ellis. * WINDS...Northwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 15 percent. * IMPACTS...Given the ongoing drought and continued dormant vegetation, any ignitions will have the potential to burn out of control quickly. Any outdoor burning, or outdoor activities involving sparks or flames, must be avoided.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
